related_post.text: Can I call python functions in java with Jython?

so_post.text: @Aboo Minister this thread might be useful to solve your underlying problem https://stackoverflow.com/questions/8147284/howtousegoogletranslateapiinmyjavaapplication

comments: This guy asks about calling java functions with python and Nasiir posts an SO link which contains a solution to the underlying problem
